Author: Ankorus
Title: [ANN][Ankorus: A new breakthrough exchange where u can buy financial assets
Body: Thought this should be put into announcements  ANKORUS ANNOUNCEMENT  (This is Martin Higgins, Media Director of Ankorus, with a message from John Cruz, CEO.)  As many of you, our core followers, know, we at Ankorus have been working very hard over the past two months to create a legal and financial infrastructure to support an easy-to-use, legally compliant, multi-asset exchange platform that facilitates a direct interface between the cryptocurrency world and traditional finance.  At this time, we would like to let you know that we have forged a significant partnership that moves us much closer to our goal. A formal announcement in this regard will go out to the general public within the next four weeks at which time we will be open for business.  In the interim, we will begin beta-testing select customers to ensure a seamless flow of our operational protocols.  We would like to thank all of you for your loyalty and steadfast support. At the time of our formal public announcement, rest assured, you will be our first customers.  Sincerely,  John Cruz,  CEO, Ankorus.

Author: Ankorus
Title: [ANN][Ankorus: A new breakthrough exchange where u can buy financial assets
Body: ANK tokens will be available publicly on the 25th. Whitelisters can get the tokens on the 23rd so I suggest you put yourself on the whitelist.  ANK tokens will be on Etherdelta & Idex after the 25th December, and on centralised exchanges a couple of weeks after that.  The Anchor Tokens (asset backed tokens) such as Apple Shares (Apple Anchors) will be available in a few months after the technology has been finalised.

Author: Ankorus
Title: [ANN][Ankorus: A new breakthrough exchange where u can buy financial assets
Body: Hello,  Sorry I've been neglecting the announcement thread. The boutny is just on fire and had my focus on that aswell as my other day to day task. Ill be making sure that I get on the ANN and answering questions.

Author: Ankorus
Title: [ANN][Ankorus: A new breakthrough exchange where u can buy financial assets
Body: ANK tokens will not be securities. They will be currency used in our ecosystem. Soon we will publish a structured tier which will show what sort of benefits ANK holder may get. From getting ultra low commissions to free debits cards and access to educational courses, webinars and a virutal trading library and more.... We will do a blog post explaining more.  Anchor token will be securities. For example 1 Apple Anchor Token will be 1 Apple Share. YOu can redeem the token through us (and we'd sell the share) and credit your account with whatever crypto or cash you'd like. We pass regulations as we will be a registered broker dealer. Financial assets by law will be regulated, audited and insured.

Author: Ankorus
Title: [ANN][Ankorus: A new breakthrough exchange where u can buy financial assets
Body: Most exchagnes are money transmitters which means theres no insurance, no auditable and no tranparency. Broker dealers are scrutinized regularly and must go through a clearing house. That means all assets by law need to audited and insured. Even if a broker dealer goes broke the clearing firm is there to protect end users. Clearing firms have higher requirements than most banks.  Apart from the safety aspect we will compete in price. To trade bitcoin on say coinbase it costs $15 per side. Thats really expensive if you're a day trader. On our platform we'll be around $1-$3 per side, youll be able to go short, use margin (the margin will be much cheaper than say bitfinex who charge 15%). Thats not including all the other markets round the world you'll be able to go through us. Theres over 100 exchanges around the world which we will connect through to, and going with our price moto we want this to be cheap and accessible so people can day trade it.  What makes Ankorus even more special is that we'll be able to tokenise financial assets which means you can buy fractions, and youll be able to trade those assets between other holders of other tokenised financial assets. We also will offer a transfer function where you can send anyone you like on the platform those tokenised assets.  Our end goal is to have a platform whereby you can buy anything from anywhere in a seamless way.

Author: Ankorus
Title: [ANN][Ankorus: A new breakthrough exchange where u can buy financial assets
Body: ANK tokens will NOT be a security, as we need it to pass the Howey test.  ANK is  actually a currency, which will be used in the ecosystem. We've actually been a little vague on what exactly the ANK tokens do and the coming days we'll lay out exactly where the value comes from. There'll be a blog in 2-3 days explaining all the aspects of the utility of the ANK token, with many details as to why you would want to possess them.  To cut it short if you have a certain amount of ANK in your smart wallet you become eligible for certain things. For exmaple you must have 5 ANK in your smart wallet to have an account to begin with.  The top level will include: - a free debit card linked to your account (all expenses are paid for - like charles schwab cards, so you can use it anywhere in the world without worrying about fees) - free educational trading course - free webinars - free datafeeds - free professional trading technologies charting tools (this usually costs thousands) - lowest commissions (<0.01%) - free virtual trading library - yearly meetup with John Cruz  Thats just a few things. Theres more but its a bit too much to put into one post. As said theres a blog going up about this soon. Also anyone who becomes top tier get these benefits lifetime.  We want to provide VALUE, especially long term value, and want to foster a place where people who actually want to grow their wealth can come.

Author: Ankorus
Title: [ANN][Ankorus: A new breakthrough exchange where u can buy financial assets
Body: Just an update.  Our bounty campaign is still ongoing. Click here to find out more https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2276127.0;all  We need Youtubers, Redditers and Bloggers. Theres a total of 750,000 ANK between all of them which is the equivalent of 1250 - 1875 ETH, and so far we've only had 2 participants. So if you want a to get an incredible amount then get on those bounties!  We are also rewarding 500 ANK to anyone who refers a Japanese or Korean Community Manager.  In general our bounty campaign is doing very well though. Twitter and Facebook are on fire and we are getting alot more attention/

Author: Ankorus
Title: [ANN][Ankorus: A new breakthrough exchange where u can buy financial assets
Body: Another daily update.  Our bounty campaign is ON FIRE thanks to all you wonderful people.  We now have the bounty campaign translated in English, Dutch, Portguese, Russian and Filipino! Totally incredible the progress we are getting.  Our twitter and facebook campaign is a huge sucess!  Our signature campaign we started to allow newbies to join (even I joined ) but unfortunately are having to ban alot of people as they spam or submit poor quality posts. While we encourage nearly everyone to participate we want quality. If you are a newbie and are a legitimate member then please head to the signature campaign - we encourage you to  High ranking members we want you too. We only have a few of you and given the bounty campaign for signatures is 600,000 ANK (equiv of 1000-1500 ETH) then each particpant is getting a massive amount.  The translation submissions are being flooded. If you were lucky enough to do any translations then you got in on time, as languages have been snapped up in a quick manner we didnt expect. Languages that are still needed are: Chinese, Croatian, Greek, Hebre, Hindi, Japanese  Youtube still ONLY has 1 participant. He's going to get a whooping 450,000 ANK (equiv of 750-1125 ETH). If you know of any youtuber or are a youtuber then please submit your sign up. Thats huge value which people are leaving on the table. Don't miss out.  Reddit and Blog are slowly gaining traction.

Body: What will be happen with unsold token? Will it burned?

Author: Ankorus
Title: [ANN][Ankorus: A new breakthrough exchange where u can buy financial assets
Body: Thanks. Almost correct. Think of us as a bridge between crypto and the traditional financial assets (these include forex, bonds, stocks, ETFs, commodities etc....)  We want to provide an opportunity for people to enter the market in an easy, cheap and accessible manner.

Author: Ankorus
Title: [ANN][Ankorus: A new breakthrough exchange where u can buy financial assets
Body: Good question. We've been going back and forth on whether to put them in treasury or burn them. We are going to a meeting to specifically discuss this point so I'll have a concrete answer by tomorrow.  I am presuming you would prefer these to be burnt?

Author: Panzersin
Title: [ANN][Ankorus: A new breakthrough exchange where u can buy financial assets
Body: Yes. All unsold token should be burnt to prevent it from big supply when it entered on market. Your token's price would be keep decreasing if these unsold token aren't burned.

Author: BestWebCreator
Title: [ANN][Ankorus: A new breakthrough exchange where u can buy financial assets
Body: Ankorus Announcement     Website Whitepaper Russian Announcement Thread Dutch Announcement Thread Korean Announcement Thread Italian Announcement Thread Indonesian Announcement Thread Hindi Announcement Thread Filipino Announcement Thread Portuguese Announcement Thread English Bounty Thread Russian Bounty Thread Dutch Bounty Part 1 Dutch Bounty Part 2 Korean Bounty Thread Italian Bounty Thread Indonesian Bounty Thread Spanish Bounty Thread Portuguese Bounty Thread   Social Media       Token Info  Ankorus will begin accepting contributions on the 25th November 2017. Interested parties can contribute cryptocurrencies to Ankorus, which will be the only form of contribution accepted.  The contribution period will last for 30 days, after which the ANK tokens will be allocated to the contributors. Contributors will be able to view their contribution in their smart wallet. The "hard cap" is set at 150,000 ETH.   100 million ANKs (the maximum supply) will be created and apportioned as follows: - 50% available to the public. - 24% allocated to the Ankorus treasury. - 15% allocated to the Ankorus founders*. - 5% allocated to Ankorus advisors*. - 3% allocated to bounties. - 3% allocated to marketers costs.

Author: Ankorus
Title: [ANN][Ankorus: A new breakthrough exchange where u can buy financial assets
Body: Regarding team information. We will be adding an advisors section to the webpage in the coming days. We currently have 8 advisors of which include a German lawyer, a Luxembourg banker and other related people in the industry. Other advisors include Ramez Naam and Alex Lightman. We also have professional country managers who will be promoting in their respective languages on Facebook, Twitter and other social media sites in their languages.  None of us have VC backgrounds and we purposely decided not to go down the VC route. VC only enables a very few select number of participants to enter at an early stage. This goes against Ankorus' ethos of enabling as low a barrier to entry as possible. We want to democratize the markets and give opportunities to as many people as possible.

Author: b4h4mu7
Title: [ANN][Ankorus: A new breakthrough exchange where u can buy financial assets
Body: Not to be a forum nazi but these tokens are not altcoins and don't belong in the altcoin section. Mods have created a token specific section. Altcoins are projects that have their own independent blockchain. Tokens are projects that rely on an altcoin blockchain i.e. Ethereum.  https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=240.0

Author: Ankorus
Title: [ANN][Ankorus: A new breakthrough exchange where u can buy financial assets
Body: While the  ANK tokens will be ERC20 compliant, the Anchor Tokens will be on its own blockchain. Respective Anchor Tokens will be backed by a real asset. For example 1 Apple Anchor will be backed by its underlying Apple Share, while 1 Facebook Anchor will be backed by its underlying Facebook Share.  Given that I think reasonable to have it within this forum.

Author: gotit
Title: [ANN][Ankorus: A new breakthrough exchange where u can buy financial assets
Body: From white paper:  Since 1992, John Cruz (JBX) has been an independent financial trader and a member of seven exchanges (CME, CBOT, MID-AM, COMEX, MATIF, Eurex, and SGX). John trades stocks, bonds, futures, options, metals, commodities and currencies.  A big part of the philosophy of crypto is to avoid "stocks, bonds, futures, options, metals, commodities and currencies." and the fiat (the centralized) world altogether. If I wanted to trade fiat, I'd join the mentioned exchanges. Ankorus philosophy seems backwards to me.  Anyhow, good luck.
